alert.note: Alert for Emanuel; Jefferson; Johnson; Laurens; Washington (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 07 at 5:22PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Laurens, northwestern Emanuel, southeastern Washington, Johnson and southeastern Jefferson Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 522 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Wrightsville, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Louisville, Wrightsville, Wadley, Bartow, Summertown, Kite, Spann, Blundale, Pringle, Lovett, Three Points, Moxley, New Home, Meeks, Brewton, Colemans Lake and Scott. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
